comment._content: Prototype L-1649A Starliner    note wing was actually tapered, camera perspective makes it look constant-chord

comment.author: 19658725@N00
comment._content: Did the 1649 have those twin exhausts on the left side of each nacelle? Or were they always outboard?

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/19658725@N00] Im looking for a good picture, but it looks like the 1649 had them on both sides....
